_header: Maiden Mother and comely Queen / That art in heaven and ever shall been
_description: ‘A salutacioun to vre ladi’ — sixty-eight 6-line stanza

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
MAyden Modur and comely QweenÞat art in heuene and euer schal
                    ben…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And schild vs from þe foule fendAnd let vs neuer be
                    schent. AM.EN.
